mapper.select: select msg.*,user.USER_NAME as fromName from t_message msg left join t_users user on msg.FROM_ID = user.USER_ID where msg.DELETED_CODE = 0 and msg.MEMBER_ID = #{message.memberId} order by msg.CREATE_AT desc
select message.MESSAGE_READ,count(*) as count from t_message message where message.DELETED_CODE = 0 and message.MEMBER_ID = #{userId} group by message.MESSAGE_READ
select distinct msg.notify_id from t_message msg where msg.DELETED_CODE = 0 and msg.BIND_TABLE = #{bindTable} and msg.DATA_ID = #{dataId}
select IFNULL(max(msg.NOTIFY_ID),0) + 1 as notifyId from t_message msg where msg.DELETED_CODE = 0
